article_title: Lebanese relief as Hezbollah and Israel seem to step back from brink
sentence: Just  hours  later,  Hamas  leader  Ismail  Haniyeh  was  assassinated  in  Tehran,  in  what  bore  all  the  hallmarks  of  another  Israeli  operation.

article_title: Lebanese relief as Hezbollah and Israel seem to step back from brink
sentence: It  was  the  biggest  flare-up  here  since  the  Gaza  war  began  last  October,  after  Hamas  killed  about  1,200  people  in  Israel  in  a  single  day.
